steps.title: Draw one small tapered oval for the head of the parrot and a big oval for the body.
steps.content: Draw one small tapered oval for the head of the parrot and a big oval for the body.

steps.title: Add two ovals for the wings.
steps.content: Add two ovals for the wings.

steps.title: Draw more ovals to define the beak and legs.
steps.content: Draw more ovals to define the beak and legs. Draw a semi-triangular shape for the tail.

steps.title: Draw small triangles to define the nails.
steps.content: Draw small triangles to define the nails. Place one big rectangle for the parrot to rest.

steps.title: Darken the lines and start drawing the curves and ridges.
steps.content: Darken the lines and start drawing the curves and ridges.

steps.title: Draw the detail based on the layout.
steps.content: Draw the detail based on the layout.

steps.title: Color and shade the parrot to make it look realistic.
steps.content: Color and shade the parrot to make it look realistic.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head of the parrot and an oval just below it for the body.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head of the parrot and an oval just below it for the body.

steps.title: Add another circle for the eyes and an extended triangle for the tail.
steps.content: Add another circle for the eyes and an extended triangle for the tail.

steps.title: Draw one tapered oval on the big oval for its wings.
steps.content: Draw one tapered oval on the big oval for its wings. Add small oval for beak. Place two legs.

steps.title: Based on the entire layout, draw the details.
steps.content: Based on the entire layout, draw the details.

steps.title: Add a horizontal line for parrot to rest.
steps.content: Add a horizontal line for parrot to rest.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the parrot.
steps.content: Color the parrot.

steps.title: Draw a small circle for the parrot’s head.
steps.content: Draw a small circle for the parrot’s head.

steps.title: Draw the curved bill connected to the circle.
steps.content: Draw the curved bill connected to the circle. Draw a small circle to show the eye.

steps.title: Draw an oblong connected to the circle for the body.
steps.content: Draw an oblong connected to the circle for the body. Draw a pointed and extended oblong attached to this for the tail feathers.

steps.title: Draw details for the parrot’s wings.
steps.content: Draw details for the parrot’s wings.

steps.title: Draw details for the branch it holds to and its clawed feet using curve lines.
steps.content: Draw details for the branch it holds to and its clawed feet using curve lines.

steps.title: Draw details for the parrot’s feathers.
steps.content: Draw details for the parrot’s feathers. Refine the drawing.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color to your liking!
steps.content: Color to your liking!

steps.title: Draw a circle for the parrot’s head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the parrot’s head.

steps.title: Draw another circle of about the same size which overlaps the first circle.
steps.content: Draw another circle of about the same size which overlaps the first circle.

steps.title: Draw the two oblongs which overlap the second circle for the wings and tail feathers.
steps.content: Draw the two oblongs which overlap the second circle for the wings and tail feathers.

steps.title: Draw details for the beak using curve lines.
steps.content: Draw details for the beak using curve lines. Draw small circles for the feet and the eye.

steps.title: Refine the drawing by adding details for the body and feathers for the wings and tail.
steps.content: Refine the drawing by adding details for the body and feathers for the wings and tail.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color to your liking!
steps.content: Color to your liking!
